features: *【4K Ultra HD】: This spy camera charger features a 4MP lens capable of delivering 4K-level clarity, ensuring 4K high-definition quality across live streaming, video recording, and playback, including 4K snapshots. The recorded footage is true-to-life, clear, and smooth.

*【Charging Hub】: This hidden camera comes with five charging ports, including four USB ports and one Type-C port, capable of fulfilling the daily charging needs of electronic devices. Its concealed lens allows for secret video recording. This hidden camera charger is ideal for discreet recording in various indoor spaces such as living rooms, bedrooms, dorms, offices, and more.

*【Wi-Fi Connection & Real-Time View】: Once connected to indoor Wi-Fi, this hidden camera enables remote control, online viewing, recording initiation, and various other functional settings. No matter when or where, simply open the mobile app for easy viewing and management.

*【Night Vision & 24/7】: This hidden camera equipped with the latest 940nm IR technology and without infrared light exposure ensures crystal-clear surveillance in low-light or nighttime settings, enabling secret recordings even in complete darkness. With its capability to capture clear videos both day and night, it achieves 24/7 uninterrupted recording, ensuring every moment is securely documented.

*【Motion Detection & Motion Zone】: This hidden camera charger allows you to define specific motion zones tailored to your needs and adjust the motion sensitivity. Upon detecting any movement, it immediately starts recording, saves the footage, and sends real-time alerts to your phone, making it convenient for you to open the app and watch the playback.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4K Ultra HD Clarity Real-Time viewing, recording, video playback, and snapshot functions all deliver 4K high-definition resolution, ensuring clear, authentic, and smooth image quality.

Night Vision This spy camera charger is equipped with 940nm IR LEDs and does not expose visible infrared light, allowing for secret video recording in the night or dark environments. The visibility range is extensive and clear.

Wi-Fi Connection & Real-Time Viewing Once connected to Wi-Fi, this hidden camera charger can be remotely controlled through an app, enabling online viewing, recording start, playback, settings adjustments, and more, from anywhere and at any time. The operation is simple, convenient, and quick.

Flexible Use Cases Capable of meeting daily charging needs for electronic devices, this hidden camera charger is suitable for use in a variety of indoor settings such as living rooms, bedrooms, dormitories, garages, offices, hotels, shops, and other indoor locations.

Smart Motion Detection Motion zones are customizable, and sensitivity settings can be tailored to your preferences. When motion is detected, it automatically starts recording and saves the clip, while also sending real-time notifications to the mobile app.
